Articles.Content: I was wondering if anyone has built a successful STS in RSS/RO/RP-O game, I've been trying for around a month to get one to fly, orbit, and land with no success. I'm using KSP 1.1.3 since that was the last stable RSS/RO/RP-O build and I have a sweet saved game on it in the late 70s with a maned Mars base, large space stations around Earth, the moon, and Mars, orbiters around all the planets except for Pluto.

I believe @Dermeister has designed, built and flown a shuttle in RSS.  Post from the V3 Shuttle Challenge here:

It's a start!

SM

I have since abandoned it because The engines I had were causing me to have to use a Fuel tank that was too big at the end also i'm having procedural parts issue with 1.2.2 I haven't played KSp in a year or so due to the Slow speeds of mods being updated. unfortunately I cannot bring myself to play KSP with out mods anymore :(. But I will give it another go when everything is on par and the bugs are fixed!
